titles.title: Auto File Act of 2008

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require the Secretary of the Treasury to establish an Auto File Program which provides certain individuals with income tax forms containing pre-filled information.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/19/2008--Introduced. Auto File Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require the Secretary of the Treasury to establish a program for mailing pre-filled income tax returns to assist certain taxpayers who may be eligible for the earned income tax credit in completing their tax returns.
